An R app running in the browser, deployed via Github Pages

```{webr-r}

webr::install("modeldata")

fit = lm(ridership ~ Clark_Lake, data = modeldata::Chicago)
summary(fit)
```

This may load slowly initially. R is literally loading packages and running a session in your browser.

It's free and it does not require an always-on server.
